Texts.Chs: 在你真正开始学习这一切知识前，你得证明你的价值。请先制作一台^orange;物质汇编机^white;。在你的^green;发明家工作台^reset;中制作一个并带给我。
Texts.Eng: Before you can really get started here you need to prove your worth. Make a ^orange;Matter Assembler^white;. ^green;Build one on your Inventor's Table^reset; and bring it here.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;物质汇编机^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Matter Assembler^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 非常好！我们随时都欢迎你的到来，虽然我们这里会偶尔下点小雨，但在这里你是绝对安全的！
Texts.Eng: Great! Welcome, and feel free to look around and get comfortable. We're safe here.
